name: LATAM 787-9 Business Class Flight Experience
description:
Wow! This trip blew me away! I think this may be one of the best value flights I've ever taken. LATAM (formerly known as LAN) operate a 787-9 on the Santiago-Madrid-Frankfurt route. I join the flight on its last leg between Madrid and Frankfurt. 

The cost? A little over Â£85 one way. An absolute steal! I love widebody aircraft on short haul routes - just for the novelty, but I'd heard good things about LATAM. My expectations were definitely met. 

Enjoy a sublime flight in a Premium Business class seat, a light meal, beverage service and super views from the large 787 windows all the way. 

Don't forget to comment, like, and subscribe! Thanks for watching.

You can also follow me on:

Twitter, @pauls_trips

Snapchat: pauls_trips
